CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: The most important slider. 50% is zero aberration. 100% is full, 0% is negative full. Be careful very far from 0, your FPS may drop.
CONTROLS.NAME: aberration_amount

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: If aberration_amount isn't set to zero, this will switch between negative and positive aberration.
CONTROLS.NAME: switch_direction

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Generally, just keep one of these four regime toggles selected at a time.
CONTROLS.NAME: clouds

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Generally, just keep one of these four regime toggles selected at a time.
CONTROLS.NAME: snakes

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Generally, just keep one of these four regime toggles selected at a time.
CONTROLS.NAME: backwards_ripples

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Generally, just keep one of these four regime toggles selected at a time.
CONTROLS.NAME: smooth_glass

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: If you get lost, go back to 'clouds' and click this button to restart the simulation.
CONTROLS.NAME: reset_sim

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Modifies the flow of the scene so that every time a drum hits, it will bounce backward.
CONTROLS.NAME: drum_flow

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: With media selected, this will use your media as a flow source on audio hits.
CONTROLS.NAME: media_hits

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Set this to automatically have audio-reactive extra distortion, or use the slider to manually control.
CONTROLS.NAME: auto_distortion

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Add an extra level of distortion to the scene, or just use the auto toggle to have the distortion on drum hits.
CONTROLS.NAME: distortion

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: When the simulation is looking a little dead, paint some new flow into it by toggling this brush on.
CONTROLS.NAME: paint1_on

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: A different, smoother style of painting that will leave streaks instead of forming ripples.
CONTROLS.NAME: paint2_on
